/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with power lines and telephone poles, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun setting on the horizon, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a soft, warm light. The image is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, presenting a typical day in the life of this bustling city.
